scripts.update:linux:darwin: npm pack && mv yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-logger-$npm_package_version.tgz ./data && cd data && npm i yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-logger-$npm_package_version.tgz && docker-compose restart
scripts.update:win32: npm pack && copy yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-logger-%npm_package_version%.tgz .\data\ && cd .\data\ && npm i yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-logger-%npm_package_version%.tgz && docker-compose restart
scripts.update:default: npm pack && mv yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-logger-$npm_package_version.tgz ./data && cd data && npm i yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-logger-$npm_package_version.tgz && docker-compose restart
